title: 91/274/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 May 1991 concerning a list of Community legislation referred to in Article 10 of Council Directive 90/220/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 21 May 1991  concerning a list of Community legislation referred to in Article 10 of Council Directive 90/220/EEC  (91/274/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
At the date of this Decision, there is no Community legislation in force which provides for a specific environmental risk assessment of products which is similar to that laid down in Directive 90/220/EEC.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 May 1991. For the Commission
Carlo RIPA DI MEANA
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 117, 8. 5. 1990, p. 15.
